text:
Hi all. Is there anyone who can clarify for me why am I not getting response 207 when using batch contacts creation endpoint?
```/crm/v3/objects/contacts/batch/create```
I send 10 data for 10 contacts to the endpoint and I intentionally force an error (I try to send some already existing contacts). However, instead of response code 207 with the appropriate response structure, I receive response code 409 with only the error structure. Is response for status code 207 currently not being sent by HubSpot API or am I doing something wrong here?

Thanks for your time

Hello, quick question for you folks. Is the GET /deals/v1/deal/recent/modified API suppose to bring back deals that have been modified LTE to the "since" query param you pass or should it be LT? The documentation states that the api "Only return deals modified after timestamp x." however, I am experiencing something different.

Example request: <https://api.hubapi.com/deals/v1/deal/recent/modified?since=1599077326130>
Unexpected response:
